isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - REMOVE - UNIVERSAL JOINT COMPANION FLANGE OR YOKE

svcproc.title: UNIVERSAL JOINT COMPANION FLANGE OR YOKE

step1.para: Lock the transmission by engaging two mainshaft gears with the mainshaft sliding clutches ( inset, Figure 36). Use a large breaker bar to turn the output shaft nut from the output shaft and remove washer if so equipped ( Figure 36).

figure.caption: Figure 36. Lock Transmission and Turn Output Shaft Nut From Output Shaft

step1.para: Pull the companion flange or yoke from the splines of the output shaft. Remove the speedometer drive gear or replacement spacer from the hub of the flange/yoke or from the inside rear bearing cover remaining on the output shaft ( inset, Figure 37). For some models, it is necessary to remove the snap ring in the groove of the output shaft PRIOR to removal of the speedometer gear or spacer.

figure.caption: Figure 37. Pull Companion Flange or Yoke From Splines of Output Shaft and Remove Snap Ring
